dict.acceptation: 癌症，恶性肿瘤；弊病，社会恶习；迅速蔓延的恶劣的或危险的事物；[天]巨蟹座，巨蟹宫；

sent.orig: Effect such as brain tumor, cervical cancer, lung cancer, cancer of the stomach, neuroblastoma intestinal cancer.
sent.trans: 脑瘤，宫颈癌，肺癌，胃癌，神经母细胞瘤等效果很好。

sent.orig: A37: Yes. they can get cancer, cancer, pancreas cancer and cancer, etc.
sent.trans: 回答37：大熊猫也会患癌症。如：皮肤癌、肝癌、胰腺癌、卵巢癌。

sent.orig: The tumours treated in the three trials were head-and-neck cancer, liver cancer and kidney cancer.
sent.trans: 在这三个试验中得到治疗的肿瘤分别是头颈癌、癌和肾癌。

sent.orig: Non-small cell lung cancer: about 80% of lung cancer patients with non-small cell lung cancer.
sent.trans: 非小细胞肺癌：约80％的肺癌患者有非小细胞肺癌。

sent.orig: Cervical cancer is the second most common form of cancer among women after breast cancer.
sent.trans: 宫颈癌是继乳腺癌之后第二个女性最常见的恶性肿瘤。
